name: Homemade Honey Mustard Chicken Salad
description: Elevate your salad game with a scrumptious medley of honey mustard-smothered chicken, crisp lettuce, and crunchy veggies. This palate-pleasing ensemble is ready to take center stage at your next meal.
instructions: In a small bowl, add mustard, honey, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Stir until combined.
In a large bowl, add lettuce, onion, tomatoes, avocado, and chicken.
Drizzle with honey mustard dressing and toss until evenly coated.
